main.description: GohanGo!! is a collection of 3,333 algorithmically generated NFTs living on the Ethereum blockchain. There will be 1,234 of them in the presale phase, and all of them are FREE  MINT.
main.description2: Every GohanGo!! NFT features a different set of unique attributes. Every attribute is designed and is meticulously hand-drawn by our Artist inspired by their own culture and stories.
main.tag: All GohanGo!! traits available in the maker!

home.backstories:
Once upon a time, there is a monkey named Gohan. He loves rice, all kinds of rice! His dream is to try out all the rice dishes across the world.

Hainanese Chicken Rice, Curry Rice, Tempura Don, Risotto, Mango Sticky Rice, Golden Fried Rice, Ekiben. You name it, he had it on his bucket list! But what he most in love with is the warm bowl of soy sauce drizzled white rice.

If you are a rice people, join GohanGo!!

promo.title: Ingenious Art
promo.description: Our artist took inspiration from her own culture and identity, every attribute is uniquely designed and delicately hand-drawn. Gohan the monkey is also inspired by the true episodes of our creator. Our motivating reason why we created Gohan is to remember the gorgeous moment in our lives and to offer an opportunity to heal.

promo.title:
Community
First
promo.description: Always put our community first. Keep building and serving our community is the #1 thing of GohanGo!!. Our mission is to build up the funniest and healthiest community in the Ethereum NFT community.

promo.title: Something Special
promo.description: We don't want to be yet another NFT project, we want to be "the" NFT project on the Ethereum blockchain. We want to support those who are in need in the world, that‚Äôs why a portion of our royalties will be used for charity.

roadmap.downloadPdfEn: Click to download - Roadmap & Holder Benefits.pdf

questions.question: Wen, how and where?
questions.answer: There will be a presale and a public sale phase. Pre-sale will start on May 8th at 04:00 PM (UTC). Public sale will start on May 9th at 04:00 PM (UTC). You will only be able to MINT them on our official website. Please follow our Twitter account and join our Discord server to get the latest updates from us!

questions.question: How much is the mint?
questions.answer: There will be 1,234 Gohans to be MINTED FOR FREE in the presale phase, and the public sale price is 0.02 ETH.

questions.question: How can I participate in the pre-sale?
questions.answer: You will need to be whitelisted in order to participate, you can follow our official Twitter account for giveaway events or join our Discord server to find out more about the rules.

questions.question: Why should I buy GohanGo!! NFT?
questions.answer: The emergence of NFTs offers an opportunity for unknown artist to share their aesthetic pieces to the whole world! So you are not only just getting a piece of JPEG, you are getting a unique NFT that was hand-drawn and randomly assembled by our talented artist. They are all living on the Ethereum blockchain, owning one of the GohanGo!! NFTs means you get access to community-wide events, giveaways and early access to any further generations and drops.

questions.question: Which GohanGo!! NFT will I get?
questions.answer: No one knows! They will all be distributed randomly, whether good or bad. The good thing is all the 3,333 NFTs are unique, they all look pretty and special!
